attributes.action: WE need to tackle climate change and deforestation
attributes.additional_details:
I want the government to reduce CO2 emissions by imposing laws to prevent the destruction of trees in order to help tackle climate change.

Climate change has been a topic in which many people choose to ignore, simply because they feel it does not affect them.

Many people from the southern part of of Britain, was affected by flooding; one of the causes of climate change. This will happen again and get worse if nothing is done about climate change!

It has been predicted that by 2050 we would have exhausted all of our resources. As a result of this there will be more diseases, natural disasters, conflict, lack of clean water and lack of food. Do you want to live in a world like this? if not, sign this petition so we can prevent all of these things.
